results.title: Kratom Industry Booms Amid Regulatory Challenges and Growing Popularity
results.body: The kratom industry has experienced significant growth in recent years, with the market size reaching $1.87 billion in 2023. and projected to expand at a compound annual growth rate of 17.2% to reach $5.69 billion by 2030.. This surge in popularity has brought both opportunities and challenges for the industry, as it navigates a complex regulatory landscape and increasing public scrutiny.
